name: If I were...
description:
If I were... A king with mustaches? A blind rabbit? An angelic nerd? And if I had the bubblegun and magic of cloning? No, no, no. Paperplanethrower as a gun and blow out magic shots! And if I tried to find some money while shoting back from the revived food. And if all this happened in space! And if I only had 20 seconds!

Try different delirious situations in "If I were...". It's more than 100 000 of possible situations!

  • 20 types of hats and 20 types of faces, that change your stats
  • 6 types of guns
  • 3 types of magic spells
  • 3 locations
  • 3 types of goals to make it in 20 seconds
  • 2 classes of enemies

Don't worry if you're dead. Find "MakAliver" machine as a ghost as fast as you can, to complete your goal. And hurry up! You only have 20 seconds... 19... 18.....

Effects of hats:

  • DMG - Damage
  • ROF - Rate of fire
  • SHS - Shot speed (speed o bullets)
  • RNG - Range
  • ACR - Accuracy

Effects of faces:

  • MP - Mana points
  • SPD - Movement speed
  • LUK - Luck (greater chance to find more coins and mana)
  • HP - Health points
  • JMP - Jump strength
